name: Lyleen

ability.name: Harvest Goddess
ability.description: When activated, the queen's soothing graces greatly restore the player's HP.

description:
A docile Pal full of love.
It watches over small Pals who have lost their parents. It uses a full-power Solar Blast to discipline naughty Pals.

skills.name: Wind Cutter
skills.description: Fires a high speed blade of wind that flies straight at an enemy.

skills.name: Seed Machine Gun
skills.description: Fires a volley of hard seeds at enemies in front of it.

skills.name: Seed Mine
skills.description: Launches a deadly seed. If it hits an enemy, the seed explodes.

skills.name: Aqua Burst
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of water and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: Grass Tornado
skills.description: Generates two tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: Spine Vine
skills.description: Generates spiny thorns that chase an enemy along the ground, piercing them from below.

skills.name: Solar Blast
skills.description: Charges solar energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
